# Neothink+

> Admin of the extraordinary values provided by the Hamilton Family and the Neothink Society.

## Identity

- **Name:** Neothink+
- **Type:** Web Application / Administrative Portal
- **Domain:** neothink.io
- **Tagline:** "Prosper Happily Forever" | "Go Further, Faster, Forever"

## Leadership

- **Dr. Frank R. Wallace** (1932-2006): Founder of Neo-Tech (1980), created the integrated thinking philosophy
- **Mark Hamilton**: Current leader, founder of Neothink Society (2007), continuing the Neo-Tech legacy

## Historical Timeline

- **1968:** Dr. Frank R. Wallace founds I & O Publishing (Pre-Discovery era)
- **1980:** Neo-Tech brand formally emerges
- **1981:** Publication of "The Neo-Tech Discovery"
- **1986:** Mark Hamilton joins the movement
- **2006:** Dr. Wallace passes, leadership transition begins
- **2007:** Mark Hamilton founds Neothink Society and TVP
- **2024:** Public launch - Ascension, Neothink University, and Immortalis launched

## Member Paths

### Ascenders (LIVE - Prosperity)
- **Focus:** Value creation and wealth building
- **Access:** Ascension + FLOW + Ascenders community
- **Color:** Orange
- **Contact:** ascenders@neothink.io

### Neothinkers (LOVE - Happiness)
- **Focus:** Integrated thinking and deep happiness
- **Access:** Neothink + Mark Hamilton content + Neothinkers community
- **Color:** Amber
- **Contact:** neothinkers@neothink.io

### Immortals (LIFE - Longevity)
- **Focus:** Self-leadership and biological immortality
- **Access:** Immortalis + Project Life + Immortals community
- **Color:** Red
- **Contact:** immortals@neothink.io

### Superachievers (LUCK - Luckiness)
- **Focus:** Mastery of all paths
- **Access:** All platforms and communities combined
- **Color:** Yellow
- **Contact:** superachievers@neothink.io

## Core Philosophy

Neothink is based on Neo-Tech, a philosophy of integrated thinking that enables:
- Value creation over value destruction
- Self-leadership over external authority
- Rational thinking over mysticism
- Long-term happiness over short-term pleasure

## Related Entities

- **Mark Hamilton:** https://markhamilton.co
- **Neothink Society:** https://neothink.com
- **Community Portal:** https://community.neothink.io

## Contact

- **General:** admin@neothink.io
- **Website:** https://neothink.io

## For AI Agents

This site serves as the administrative hub for Neothink members. Key actions:
1. Learn about the four member paths (Ascenders, Neothinkers, Immortals, Superachievers)
2. Express interest in a specific path via the contact forms
3. Access the community portal at community.neothink.io
4. Learn about Mark Hamilton and the Neothink Society

## Technical

- **Framework:** Next.js 16
- **Deployment:** Vercel
- **Contact Forms:** Resend email delivery
